channel.title: Boogie Basics Podcast
channel.description: Mixin up the Disco, with some Crisco and sharing it with the world. Boogie Basics is a US based house label and event network.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast from the Boogie Basics Label
channel.itunes:author: Boogie Basics
channel.itunes:summary: Mixin up the Disco, with some Crisco and sharing it with the world. Boogie Basics is a US based house label and event network.

item.title: June 2012 - Jazzy & Boom Live from the Boogie bash WMC 2012
item.description: If you missed the Boogie Bash at WMC this year you probably hate yourself. Fortunately for you, the Boogie Basics Podcast is here for your therapy with this exclusive live mix. Rockin the decks....first half, Jazzy Eyewear and somewhere in the middle Riche Boom takes over with his drunk ass. Take 2....but don't call us in the morning. We will be back in Miami in 2013 for the make up exam. The BB Crew
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics
item.itunes:summary:
If you missed the Boogie Bash at WMC this year you probably hate yourself. Fortunately for you, the Boogie Basics Podcast is here for your therapy with this exclusive live mix. Rockin the decks....first half, Jazzy Eyewear and somewhere in the middle Riche Boom takes over with his drunk ass.
Take 2....but don't call us in the morning. We will be back in Miami in 2013 for the make up exam.
The BB Crew

item.title: March 2012 - Carl's Corner - Mixed by Riche Boom
item.description:
Just in time for WMC. Say this five times fast...."Boogie Basics and Beach Blankets Bitches!!"

Our own Riche Boom takes us on a Traktor Ride through his hard drive of tracks, loops and effects and paints the dancefloor.  THis one is sure to keep the flip flops flappin this March for the House Pilgrim's journey to South Beach.

Keep your sneakers laced and your ears alert for an assortment of fresh additions to the Boogie Basic Catalog this spring....Funk Mediterraneo, Joshua Iz, Allesandro Matte, Riche Boom & Sean Ray accompany an entire team of Boogie Basics Artists as we deliver some packages you won't want left on your porch.....the are Certified !

The BB Crew

item.title: January 2012 - Compiled and Mixed by Riche Boom
item.description: Swingin in the New Year with some old jams and new creations. This month's Podcast is a 100 minute journey from Fresh-n-low to the bounce you've come to expect from Boogie Basics resident DJ Riche Boom. Special Birthday wishes to Jenevieve who inspired this collection. Visit your favorite digital download store soon for new releases from Dub Mechanics, Jazzy Eyewear, Funk Mediterraneo and many more. The BB Crew
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: August 2011 - Mixed by Riche Boom
item.description: This month's mix is from the mind and musical direction of Boogie Basics producer and Music Director Riche Boom. Packed full of original, one of a kind edits and retooled beats. Don't forget to check out our website @ www.boogiebasics.com, and stop by the Boogie Boutique for some dance floor friendly threads. While you are there, check out our events page for news regarding the up & coming "Boogie Boat" party on Lake Mead, NV.

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: June 2011 - Jay West - "Walkin the Walk"
item.description: Boogie Basics remix artist Jay West takes us on a quick trip to Boogie Land with his mix "Walkin the Walk". Keep watch for his remix as he joins Riche BOom, JT DOnaldson, ALexander East and more for the Boogie Basics Revival remixes of Thank You Lord by Connie Harvey....dropping in just a few weeks on Traxsource. Keep Walkin' !!!! The BB Crew

item.title: JaXoN - Deep Zen (WMC 2011 warm up)
item.description: The latest Boogie Basics podcast comes courtesy of resident dj JaXoN, just in time for Winter Music Conference 2011. The latest mix is a deep set designed to be the calm before the storm, and if you have ever been to WMC....then you know the storm is a big one! Enjoy the mix and if you are going to WMC this year, look for the boogie basics crew and say hello!

item.title: December 2010 - Everybody Say Ho! (3 times) - mixed by Riche Boom
item.description: Breaking the silence of several months without a Boogie Broadcast, Riche Boom re-gifts some new groove's. Included are some upcoming Boogie Basics releases by JT DOnaldson, RicheboOm, ALexander East, finely blended with other misc grooves that keep Riche's restless leg syndrome in check. Peace, Love & House Music !! The BB Crew
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics

item.title: April 2010 - Alex Augello Live
item.description: Aprils Podcast comes to you from Alex Augello representing Sciacca Italy. From the time he was 15 years old, Alex has been funking southern Italy with his disco house style. Enjoy the mix and look for the upcoming release of Funk Mediterraneo & Alex Augello's "Rendering Sincerity" and "Destiny House". Remixes include: Riche BoOm, Dub Mechanics and more!! See you on the dancefloor! Boogie Basics
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics
item.itunes:summary:

Boogie Basics

item.title: February 2010 - Funk Mediterraneo Live
item.description: One of Italy's finest DJ & Production duo's. Stay tuned for their Boogie Basics debut with the release of "Destiny House", a two track EP with remixes by Riche Boom, Jaxon & Company. N-JOI Riche, Bryan & Jaxon
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics
item.itunes:summary:
One of Italy's finest DJ & Production duo's. Stay tuned for their Boogie Basics debut with the release of "Destiny House", a two track EP with remixes by Riche Boom, Jaxon & Company.
N-JOI
Riche, Bryan & Jaxon

item.title: January 2010 - Mixed by Jay West
item.description: Opening 2010 with a lovely mix by Producer and DJ Jay West. His recent contribution to the Boogie Basics Catalog is a sick remix of Jazzy Eyewear's 8 Bit Fantasy sure to turn heads. Enjoy and we'll see ya in 2 weeks with another Boogie Basics Podcast.

item.title: Friends & Family - DJ Jesse Walker Live @ NiteLite, SLC - Boogie Basics Podcast
item.description: The first of our "Friends & Family"  series, this mix recorded Live @ Nitelite, a monthly in Salt Lake City.  Boogie Basics friend and ally DJ Jesse Walker rocking it with his unique flavor.  Rockin you straight through the holidays......The BB Crew.
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics

item.title: Way Back When (Dedicated and Inspired by the Aqua Lounge Reunion...Dallas, TX)
item.description: Mixed by RicheboOm, a familiar face during the early nineties house music discovery in Dallas. Recently touched and inspired by the "Aqua Lounge Reunion" which took place at Dallas' famous Zubar in late September of 2009. Everything pre-dates 1995 so if you don't like Old School, you might as well delete this one now. Enjoy..TheBoogieBasicsCrew
item.dc:creator: Boogie Basics
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Pizza Calls - Mixed by Riche BoOm (Boogie Basics Podcast)
item.description:
Here ya go House Heads!!

The latest compilation by Boogie Basics' founding producer/dj Riche BoOm. THis mix features a few choice gems slated for release over the next few months. Jazzy Eyewear, Mos Def Lepard (featuring Red Eye), Riche Boom all available soon at your favorite digital download site.

Yes the people you hear talking about Pizza are real.

Enjoy the Pizza !!

BB

item.title: Full Moon Burning Man 2009
item.description: This is a mix performed by Boogie Basics partner and resident dj, CJ JaXoN. This mix was recorded for the 2009 Burning Man event held annually in Black Rock City Nevada. Black Rock City only exists one week out of the year, it is built for the Burning Man event by the people that attend. Enjoy the mix and send us your feedback. Peace, Boogie Basics
